label: AB_tP2_123_a_d-002
title: $\delta$-CuTi ($L2_{a}$) Structure
comments:
As we have been unable to find a copy of (Karlsson, 1951), we obtained the value a = 4.44{\AA} from (Pearson, 1958).  The ICSD entry uses a = 3.14{\AA}, referencing the original publication.  For now we will continue to use the value from (Pearson, 1958). 
 This structure has the same AFLOW designation, AB\_tP2\_123\_a\_d, as \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_tP2_123_a_d-001}{CuAu ($L1_{0}$)}.  The only difference in the structures is the c/a ratio.  $L1_{0}$ has $c/a \approx \sqrt{2}$, characteristic of face-centered cubic ordering, while $L2_{a}$ has $c/a \approx 1$, a body-centered cubic-like system.
